title: The Mad Summoner of League of Legends - Novel Updates

tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Loli   Male Protagonist   Parody   Polygamy   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Strong Love Interests   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   World Travel

description: Lin Ling, a normal college student, was summoned to Valoran with a special identity as a summoner. He has a system that allows him to learn the skills of all the heroes of multiples games he had on his laptop before being transported to Runeterra, and also gives him the ability to travel to different game worlds to obtain new powers and enhancements.>
